results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Omnibus”
Portrait of an English drama teacher, Dorothy Heathcote. Shows her work in Tyneside with a variety of young people from an approved school, a junior school, and a hospital for the mentally handicapped.
Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.

results.title: Parting shots from animals
results.creator_credit: Michael Dibb, Christopher Rawlence and BBC
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Omnibus”.
Based on essays by John Berger, the film looks at how man’s exploitation of animals has affected himself. From a variety of locations ranging from circuses to slaughterhouses, the evolution of man’s attitude to animals is traced.

results.title: Freestyle
results.creator_credit: Rick Pepin, Dan Ryan and Aquaforum Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976-1980 Olympic & world class swimmers”.
One of a series of films which shows swimmers, and their styles and techniques. Slow motion is used to clarify the demonstrations. This film concentrates on freestyle swimming.

results.title: Butterfly women
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976-1980 Olympic & world class swimmers”.
The swimmers Tracey Caulkins, Joan Pennington, Nancy Hogshead and Cynthia Woodhead are shown in action from above and below the waterline demonstrating the butterfly stroke. Includes booklet.
results.description:
Episode of Series “1976-1980 Olympic & world class swimmers”.

results.title: Backstroke: women
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “1976-1980 Olympic & world class swimmers”.
The fundamentals of backstroke are shown by swimmers Tracey Caulkins, Kim Carlisle, Linda Jezek, Melissa Belote and Cheryl Gibson. Includes booklet.
